channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Winter Footwear Edit
channel.desc: Refresh your cold-weather footwear collection with The Winter Footwear Edit, showcasing a stylish range of on-trend trainers, boots and more that are perfect for chilly days and nights.

channel.title: Winter Footwear Edit
channel.desc: Refresh your cold-weather footwear collection with The Winter Footwear Edit, showcasing a stylish range of on-trend trainers, boots and more that are perfect for chilly days and nights.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kitchen Gifts with Ninja
channel.desc: Looking for the perfect gift for a foodie? Ninja is here with innovative and high-performing kitchen gadgets designed with ease in mind, making preparing your favourite meals and drinks a doddle.

channel.title: Winter Footwear Edit
channel.desc: Refresh your cold-weather footwear collection with The Winter Footwear Edit, showcasing a stylish range of on-trend trainers, boots and more that are perfect for chilly days and nights.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Big Deal Morning Show
channel.desc: Start your week with a first look at some of the most exciting limited time offers at QVC across home, garden, beauty and fashion in The Big Deal Morning Show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies
channel.desc: Committed to quality, design and value for money, Hush Puppies have become a household name and offer a wide range of ladies' footwear styles to suit any outfit.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ichi Danish Fashion
channel.desc: Discover Ichi's creative fashion to uplift your wardrobe! Showcasing hand-drawn prints, bold designs and exceptional craftsmanship, Ichi will transform your look in a matter of moments. Find out how.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cosy Cottage Christmas Style
channel.desc: Cosy Cottage Christmas Style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Winter Boots
channel.desc: Give your winter wardrobe a new lease of life with our great selection of stylish boots. Find a great pair to complement any outfit throughout the season, from all of the brands you know and love.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Phase Eight
channel.desc: We're bringing the high street's fashion destination to your sofa with Phase 8's extensive range of sophisticated, high quality designs for all occasions, in a variety of feminine prints and colours.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonds
channel.desc: Dedicated to lovers of diamond jewellery, this show presents a range of 9 carat gold jewellery that combines diamonds with amethyst, garnet, peridot, blue topaz, citrine and other favourite gemstones.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies
channel.desc: Committed to quality, design and value for money, Hush Puppies have become a household name and offer a wide range of ladies' footwear styles to suit any outfit.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kitchen Gifts with Ninja
channel.desc: Looking for the perfect gift for a foodie? Ninja is here with innovative and high-performing kitchen gadgets designed with ease in mind, making preparing your favourite meals and drinks a doddle.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Wilfred's Pies
channel.desc: Treat yourself to high quality, freshly made, deliciously crafted pies, pasties, and more from Wilfred's Pies.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hobbs London
channel.desc: Inspired by London and designed in London, Hobbs has been providing modern cuts, feminine tailoring and heritage craftsmanship since their establishment in Hampstead in 1981.

channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: DIY & Garden Gifts
channel.desc: Join us for a showcase of tools to aid your everyday DIY tasks, from fixing the roof to changing a light bulb, this show has the answers. Plus find great gifts, perfect for people who love gardening.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Andi Peters' Food Fest
channel.desc: Enjoy sumptuous and tasty delights from an array of our most-loved food brands, both old favourites and new discoveries, hosted by Andi Peters and Dale Franklin.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Men's Fashion with Seasalt
channel.desc: Refresh his wardrobe with Seasalt's effortlessly stylish menswear. Discover the perfect gift for every man, from classic shirts to cosy knits, all crafted with comfort and flair in mind.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Wilfred's Pies
channel.desc: Treat yourself to high quality, freshly made, deliciously crafted pies, pasties, and more from Wilfred's Pies.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Winter Wonderland Shop
channel.desc: Winter Wonderland Shop.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: QVC Food Hall
channel.desc: QVC Food Hall brings you a show packed full of delicious treats from some of your most loved food brands at QVC. Sweet or savoury, we'll have something to tempt your taste buds in this show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonique Gifts
channel.desc: Diamonique is the finest simulated diamond in the world. In this show we present a range of rings, earrings and pendants to help you find the perfect present for a loved one - or a treat for yourself.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ninja Cooking Appliances
channel.desc: From blending up ingredients to whipping up tasty meals, Ninja helps you prepare delicious, healthy food in your own kitchen. Showcasing their range of innovations, you won't want to miss this show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tarte Cosmetics
channel.desc: This show features high performance natural products from Tarte Cosmetics, including everything from Amazonian clay to maracuja oil. Find a wide variety of glamorous eco-chic products you'll love.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.
